keywordspec.name: TestFXLibrary
keywordspec.doc:
TestFXLibrary is a ... library for the Robot Framework.

Insert library introduction here.

kw.name: Click On
kw.doc:
Clicks on a indentifier.

Parameters:
    identifier  A string containing the identifier of the node to be clicked.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the Java FX application. The primary stage is hidden and cleaned-up.

kw.name: Close Current Window
kw.doc: Close the current focused window

kw.name: Double Click On
kw.doc:
Double Click on a node.
Parameters:
    identifier  The identifier of the node

kw.name: Drag
kw.doc:
Drag a node.

Parameters:
    identifier  The identifier of the node to be draged.

kw.name: Drop
kw.doc:
Drop a node that is being draged.
Parameters:
    identifier The identifier of the node

kw.name: Drop To
kw.doc:
Drop to specific node.

Parameters:
    identifier The identifier of the node

kw.name: Echo
kw.doc:
Returns the given message.

Parameters:
    message The message to return.

kw.name: Echo With Default
Erase Text
kw.doc:
Erase Text from a text field
Parameters:
    numberOfCharacters  The number of characters to be erased

kw.name: Launch Application
kw.doc:
Launch Java FX application.
The classname given must extend javafx.application.Application.
ATENTTION: The class must be added to the classpath beforehand.
Parameters:
    className  The name of the class that extends javafx.application.Application to be launched.

kw.name: Launch JAR Application
kw.doc:
Launch Java FX application from external JAR.
The classname given must extend javafx.application.Application.
ATENTTION: The JAR must be added to the classpath beforehand.
Parameters:
    applicationJAR  The path of the JAR that contains the application to be launched. The JAR must contain a JavaFX application with a class that extends javafx.application.Application.
    className  The name of the class im the JAR that extends javafx.application.Application to be launched.

kw.name: List Target Windows
kw.doc:
List all target windows
Returns:
    A list of javafx.stage.Window

kw.name: List Windows
kw.doc:
List all Windows
Returns:
    A list of javafx.stage.Window

kw.name: Move By
kw.doc:
Move the mouse to a x,y coordinate
Parameters:
    xCoordinate The x coordinate
    yCoordinate The y coordinate

kw.name: Move To
kw.doc:
Move Mouse to node
Parameters:
    identifier  The identifier of the node

kw.name: Press
kw.doc:
Press a key
Parameters:
    keycode  the keycode of the key to be pressed. eg. "Enter"

kw.name: Relase
kw.doc:
Relese a key
Parameters:
    keycode The keycode of the key to be released. eg. "Enter"

kw.name: Right Click On
kw.doc:
Right Click on node
Parameters:
    identifier  The identifier of the node

kw.name: Scroll Down
kw.doc:
Scroll down
Parameters:
    amount  The amount to be scrolled

kw.name: Scroll Left
kw.doc:
Scroll left
Parameters:
    amount  The amount to be scrolled

kw.name: Scroll Right
kw.doc:
Scroll right
Parameters:
    amount  The amount to be scrolled

kw.name: Scroll Up
kw.doc:
Scroll up
Parameters:
    amount  The amount to be scrolled

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc:
Sleep. Pause the execution during a period
Parameters:
    milliseconds  The number of millisenconds to pause the execution

kw.name: Target Window
kw.doc:
Target a scpecific window
Parameters:
    identifier the identifier of the window

kw.name: Type
kw.doc:
Type a keycode
Parameters:
    keycode  The keycode to be typed

kw.name: Window
kw.doc:
Choose? window
Parameters:
    identifier  the identifier of the window

kw.name: Write
kw.doc:
Writes text on the focused node. (eg. a text field)
Parameters:
    text  The text to written
